   (viii) UNIZIK accepts two (2) 'A' level passes from Economics, 
Mathematics and Political Science. Direct Entry Applicants 
must possess the UTME requirements.  
(ix) UNN requires the UTME requirements.  
(x) DELSU accepts NCE in Economics and one other Social 
Science subject.  
(xi) EKSU accepts any of the following:  
(a) Five (5) 'O' level credit passes in Mathematics, Economics, 
English Language and two (2) other subjects one (1) of which 
must be from the Social Sciences.  
(b) Two (2) 'A' level passes in Economics and any of Geography, 
Government and Mathematics.  
(xii) COVENANT accepts ND upper credit in Marketing, Business 
Administration or Banking and Finance.  
(xiii) IGBINEDION accepts ND lower credit in Accounting, Business 
Administration/ Banking and Finance; NCE in Economics,  
Mathematics or any other Social Science subject.  
(xiv) AL-HIKMAH accepts two (2) 'A' level passes in Economics and  
any other relevant subject.  
(xv) CUAB requires two (2) 'A' level passes to include 
Mathematicsand e ither Economics or Accounting. Accepts 
NCE/ND and approved equivalent of at least upper credit in 
relevant programmes and IJMB at acceptable levels  
(xvi) JOS does not require 'O' level credit pass in History and does 
not accept ND, HND and NCE as entry requirements.  
(xvii) AAUA does not accept Physics, Chemistry or Agricultural 
Science but accepts ND upper credit and HND lower credit 
level in relevant programmes.  
(xxiv) UYO accepts ND/HND in relevant programmes plus the 
UTME requirements.  
(xxv) AJAYI accepts 'A' level or equivalents in Economics and one 
of  Accounting,  Business  Management, 
 Mathematics, Geography and Government.  
(xxvi) BIU same as in Accounting  
(xxvii) UMUDIKE and BOWEN - Same as in Accountancy.  
(xxviii) UNIOSUN accepts ND upper credit and approved equivalent 
in Accounting, Business Administration and Banking and 
Finance.  
(xxix) AUN accepts
